request.description:
This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password.
If the credentials are correct, it returns an access token and user information.
This endpoint logs out the authenticated user by revoking all their tokens.

item.name: Get a list of all banks.

{
 "status": "success",
 "banks": [
     {
         "id": 1,

 ]

formdata.description: The unique identifier for the company profile.
The name of the contact person.
The date of filling REX number.
Indicates if partial shipment is allowed.

request.description: This endpoint allows you to update the company profile details. The variables are in snake_case and should be provided in the request body. company_logo and signature_upload both send direct file only, don't refer example for both.

Display a listing of the company raw materials.
This endpoint returns a list of all company raw materials.

Store a newly created company raw material in storage.
This endpoint allows you to create a new company raw material.

{
 "errors": {

variable.description: The ID of the company raw material to delete.

request.description:
Remove the specified company raw material from storage.
This endpoint allows you to delete a company raw material by providing its ID.

item.name: Calculate the totals for pallets, bags, bags per pallet, weight per bag, and total weight.

request.description:
This endpoint calculates the sum of various properties of company raw materials filtered by a specific date.
The properties include total pallet count, total bag count, total bags per pallet count, total weight per bag count, and total weight count.

item.name: Calculate the totals for pallets, bags, bags per pallet, weight per bag, and total weight.

request.description:
This endpoint calculates the sum of various properties of company raw materials filtered by a specific date.
The properties include total pallet count, total bag count, total bags per pallet count, total weight per bag count, and total weight count.
